DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety effectiveness 2 dos investigational drug , lasofoxifene , compare placebo ( inactive substance ) reduce new spinal fracture woman osteoporosis .
DOC.brief_title: Postmenopausal Evaluation Risk-reduction With Lasofoxifene ( PEARL )
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal least 5 year ; Screening bone mineral density equal 2.5 S.D.s mean young adult lumbar spine femoral neck . Metabolic bone disease osteoporosis ; Taking approve medication osteoporosis ; Have recent osteoporotic fracture ( within 1 year ) and/or bone mineral density 4.5 S.D.s mean young adult lumbar spine femoral neck .
